name: GrayNoiseforSleep,Relaxation,andFocus
0:
”Alexa open gray noise”
”Alexa ask gray noise to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gray noise
des: Gray Noise is a proven and effective way to block out distractions and fall asleep easy. With a softer sound than White or Pink noise, Gray Noise is the ultimate soothing companion for relaxation, focus, and better sleep. \n\nAll you need to do is say Alexa start Gray Noise, and she will play the track for 30 minutes. This is a perfect skill to leave on while you are asleep, to use for relaxation and meditation, or to tune in and focus on your work.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
